hero.name: Egriano Aristianto
hero.title: A Fullstack Engineer
hero.subtitle: {{years}}+ years building scalable digital platforms that drive business growth

about.title: About Me
about.description: Greetings! I'm a Fullstack Engineer with experience building scalable end-to-end digital platforms across multiple industries, including enterprise SaaS, conversational AI, fintech, and health-tech. I specialize in designing and developing integrated web applications using React, TypeScript, GraphQL, and Node.js, with strong expertise in system integration, microservices architecture, and third-party platform orchestration. My work focuses on delivering production-ready systems that connect complex business processes, automate workflows, and enable data-driven decision-making.

jobs.description: Engineered enterprise-grade digital platforms that support complex end-to-end business processes, including sales workflows, financing orchestration, document automation, payment processing, and AI-driven customer engagement that being deployed across international markets, improving operational efficiency and enabling data-driven business decisions.
highlights: Built scalable full-stack solutions using React, TypeScript, GraphQL, and Node.js
Integrated third-party services including payment gateways, e-signature providers, and AI systems
Deployed solutions across international markets with focus on operational efficiency

jobs.description: Led solution design and technical implementation for enterprise chatbot and conversational AI projects across multiple industries. Focused mainly on business backend logic, third-party integrations, and omnichannel communication capabilities to build scalable conversational systems.
highlights: Designed and implemented enterprise chatbot solutions across multiple industries
Built backend logic for conversational AI platforms
Enabled integrations with external platforms to extend functionality across business ecosystems

jobs.description: Built microservices-based backend systems and responsive web applications supporting transactional platforms and corporate dashboards. Product build mainly focused on health-tech and F&B-focused digital products.
highlights: Developed microservices architecture for transactional platforms
Built responsive web applications for health-tech and F&B industries
Created corporate dashboards for business intelligence

items.title: Enterprise Digital Platform
items.description: End-to-end digital platform supporting sales workflows, financing orchestration, document automation, payment processing, and AI-driven customer engagement.

items.title: Enterprise Conversational AI Platform
items.description: Scalable chatbot and conversational AI solutions for enterprise clients across multiple industries with omnichannel support.

items.title: Health-tech & F&B Digital Solutions

contact.title: Get In Touch
contact.description: I'm currently open to new opportunities and interesting projects. Feel free to reach out if you'd like to connect!
